metadata.synopsis: Two cultists guarding Minsc's hideout discuss the meeting between him and the Zhent leader after the Counting House Heist
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the Minsc's Hideout  and observe the cultists guarding the Sluice gate after the Counting Houselarian://bookmark?name=CTY_UC_MinscHideout&mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-249.169617;82.351547;862.876221&camTarget=-249.108841;81.364174;863.022522

0.speaker: Barnz
0.text: No mistakes now. The boss won't wants no interruptions while the Zhent is here.

5.speaker: Cilarea
5.text: Heh. Do you mean the Stone Lord, or the real boss?
5.context: NodeContext: Mocking Stone Lord - they both know the real boss is the doppelganger who controls him.

1.speaker: Barnz
1.text: Why do we even need the Zhentarim? They worship nothing but their own fattened purses.

2.speaker: Cilarea
2.text: Avarice and self-interest. Instruments of the Lord of Murder, wouldn't you say?

6.speaker: Cilarea
6.text: And what of the Stone Lord, when all of this is done?

3.speaker: Barnz
3.text: Perhaps Lady Orin will reacquaint him with our Lord. They are old friends, after all.
3.context: NodeContext: Relish at the prospect of Minsc being sacrificed to Bhaal.

7.speaker: Barnz
7.text: Did you hear the boss is finally meeting with those mercenaries?

4.speaker: Barnz
4.text: Yeah, best stay out of their way.

8.speaker: Barnz
8.text: I will not miss sleeping in this arena-sized chamber pot. Our Lord of Murder should have his will worked beneath the sun.
